contest-event.event-date:
July 18, 1925 D Stamford Contest
Stamford Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
stamford-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Stamford, Lincolnshire, England, UK Promoted by Stamford Town Band Prizes - 1st £9, 2nd £5.10s., 3rd £3, 4th £1. March: 1. B Winning, 2. Earls Barton Choice of test pieces: "Echoes of the Opera" or "Dawn of Spring" The original adjudicator, W. Tudor Roberts, died suddenly in North Wales, and F. Thorpe was rapidly engaged as a replacement. 6 bands competed.
Dec. 10, 2013, 5:03 p.m. Nov. 5, 2018, 3:12 p.m.
1 B Winning and Blackwell Colliery T. F. Ward
2 Foresters Brass L. Sleight
3 Earls Barton Band A. Lawson
4 Upwell Albert Ryder
